name: Cyberpong
summary: Enter a realm of cyberspace where hitting digital orbs can gain you ultimate glory! In this retro styled game you are given two paddles to prove what you're made of. Harness your skills in single player mode and then face off against your friends in multiplayer matches!
info:
• 中文名: 赛博兵乓
  • 平台: PC
  • 开发商: COLOPL, Inc.
  • 发行: COLOPL, Inc.
  • 游戏类型: VR ACT
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 2016年4月28日
